attributes.comment:
RE USCIS2006-0044-001

I think that the increased costs are just too much. I would like to see the work for
much of this processes be streamlined and made more cost efficient, not just
increase the charges to the consumer. It is especially notable that they were
increased just two years ago a new 66% to 80% incease only two years later is
evidence of poor management of time and resources.

I am an adoptive parent that has been through the I600 system 3 times in order to
adopt a child. One quick solution to streamline. Fingerprints only last 12 months
the I600 A lasts 18 months. Make them match. Make them both last two years so
a family can get thier adoption finished before the paperwork runs out. Adoptions
are taking longer and we adoptive parents would be happy to reduce the workload
by not having to complete the same paperwork over and over for the same
adoption.

Make the system work better rather than throw money at it.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Susan V
